languages.text: "Сегодня я не по твою душу, еретичка, так что держи голову низко и помни, что в другую нашу встречу я могу не пожалеть на тебя патрон-другой".
"I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня я не по твою душу, еретичка, так что держи голову низко и помни, что в другую нашу встречу я могу не пожалеть на тебя патрон-другой".

traits.locale_text: "I am not here for you, heretic, so keep your head bowed low and remember that when next we meet, I might just spare a shell or two for you."
"I am not here for you, heretic, so keep your head bowed low and remember that when next we meet, I might just spare a shell or two for you."
"I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, and maybe I won't have to reserve a bullet or two just for you."
"I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, and maybe I won't have to reserve a bullet or two just for you."
"I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."
"I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."

languages.text: “我不是来抓你的，异端分子。你最好老实点，别惹事。说不定下次见面的时候，我会稍微留点情面，不至于赏你一两颗子弹。”
languages.original_text: "I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."

traits.locale_text: “我不是来抓你的，异端分子。你最好老实点，别惹事。说不定下次见面的时候，我会稍微留点情面，不至于赏你一两颗子弹。”
“我不是来抓你的，异端分子。你最好老实点，别惹事，说不定下次见面的时候，我用不着给你留一两颗子弹。”

languages.text: «No he venido aquí por ti, hereje. Agacha la cabeza y recuerda que, la próxima vez que nos encontremos, puedo sentirme más generoso y regalarte una bala o dos».
languages.original_text: "I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."

traits.locale_text: «No he venido aquí por ti, hereje. Agacha la cabeza y recuerda que, la próxima vez que nos encontremos, puedo sentirme más generoso y regalarte una bala o dos».

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas là pour vous, hérétique. Mais vous feriez mieux de vous faire discrète. La prochaine fois que je vous croiserai, je pourrais bien être d'humeur plus généreuse et prendre le temps de garder une ou deux balles pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas là pour vous, hérétique. Mais vous feriez mieux de vous faire discrète. La prochaine fois que je vous croiserai, je pourrais bien être d'humeur plus généreuse et prendre le temps de garder une ou deux balles pour vous. »

languages.text: 「異端者よ、お前のために来たわけじゃない。だから大人しくしていろ。次に会うときは、気が向いてお前に弾を数発だけ譲ってやるかもしれんぞ、覚えておけ」
languages.original_text: "I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者よ、お前のために来たわけじゃない。だから大人しくしていろ。次に会うときは、気が向いてお前に弾を数発だけ譲ってやるかもしれんぞ、覚えておけ」

languages.text: "Buraya senin için gelmedim kâfir. Başını önüne eğ, bir daha karşılaşırsak sana da birkaç mermi ayıracak kadar cömert davranabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya senin için gelmedim kâfir. Başını önüne eğ, bir daha karşılaşırsak sana da birkaç mermi ayıracak kadar cömert davranabilirim."

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht wegen Euch hier, Ketzerin. Also zieht den Kopf ein und denkt daran, dass ich beim nächsten Mal vielleicht großzügiger bin und ein oder zwei Kugeln nur für Euch erübrige."
languages.original_text: "I am not here for you, heretic. So, keep your head down and remember that the next time we meet, I might feel more generous and spare a bullet or two just for you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht wegen Euch hier, Ketzerin. Also zieht den Kopf ein und denkt daran, dass ich beim nächsten Mal vielleicht großzügiger bin und ein oder zwei Kugeln nur für Euch erübrige."
